Package wordEater.SimpleList

Class SimpleList<E extends ISimpleListElement<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordEater.SimpleList.SimpleList<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of the list elements. The type must implement ISimpleListElement interface.
    public class SimpleList<E extends ISimpleListElement<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A very basic list class.
    Author:
    fabricebelloncle

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the list

      • insertAtIndex

        public void insertAtIndex​(int index,
                          E element)
        Inserts at index or at end of list if index is greater than list size.
        Parameters:
        index - position in the list where the element should be inserted. Must be a valid index (between 1 and list size). If index is out of bounds, an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown.
        element - element to insert in the list

      • getAtIndex

        public E getAtIndex​(int index)
        Gets the list element specified by the index
        Parameters:
        index - position of the element. Must be a valid index (between 1 and list size). If index is out of bounds, an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown.
        Returns:
        element with the given index

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf​(E element)
        Gets the index of the specified element. The compareTo() method from the list parameterized type is used to compare list elements.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to search
        Returns:
        index of element in the list or -1 if not found

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(E element)
        Tests if list contains an element. The compareTo() method from the list parameterized type is used to compare list elements.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to search
        Returns:
        true if element has been found, otherwise false

      • length

        public int length()
        Returns the current list size
        Returns:
        list size
